tagline.title: BALI NUSA DUA TOUR IS HALF DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR VISIT TOURISM SITE IN NUSA DUA VILLAGE SUCH AS WATER BLOW, PANDAWA BEACH AND GARUDA WISNU KENCANA

description.text: Bali Nusa Dua Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Packages to visit the tourist destination in Nusa Dua Village with all its natural beauty and very interesting cultural park, very suitable for those of you who want a short tour to visit tourist destinations close to the city, maybe this is an option for those of you who want a half day city tour in Nusa Dua. Firstly, our tour driver will pick you up at your place of stay and visit the Water Blow Nusa Dua tourist destination to see the waves crashing against the rocks which cause splashes of water and loud sounds, but please remember that seeing this depends on the weather, we cannot guarantee when The waves will be big, but if you can't see the water blow, you can still enjoy the beautiful scenery around it. Continue visiting Pandawa Beach with its enchanting natural beauty, continue visiting Garuda Wisnu Kencana is spacious cutural park and viewing area the largest statue on the island of Bali, Enjoy the beautiful panorama view from Garuda Wisnu Kencana and see the amazing statue in the park, then we continue to the restaurant in Nusa Dua village to enjoy delicious Indonesian food for lunch, after lunch we will take you back to the hotel with a very impressive experience in this half day Nusa Dua tour package accompanied by A professional and friendly tour driver will make this Bali Nusa Dua Tour even more impressive

title.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour | Water Blow Nusa Dua

image.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour | Water Blow Nusa Dua | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Water Blow Nusa Dua is a natural tourist destination located in the village of Nusa Dua, in this place we can see the waves hitting the rocks, causing splashes of water upwards and the sound of water booming, a very amazing sensation felt when seeing Water Blow Nusa Dua. Even though it's called water blow beach, but here there is no beach sand, but only rocks that are here. But keep in mind that this place is dangerous, please do not exceed the limits set here, to maintain your safety. Apart from that, being able to see the waves crashing depends on the weather conditions, because we don't know for sure when the big waves will hit the rocks, sometimes we only see calm water, if we can't see the waves crashing, we can still enjoy the beautiful view of the ocean and its surroundings.

Apart from that, being able to see the waves crashing depends on the weather conditions, because we don't know for sure when the big waves will hit the rocks, sometimes we only see calm water, if we can't see the waves crashing, we can still enjoy the beautiful view of the ocean and its surroundings.

title.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour | Pandawa Beach

image.title: Bali Half Day usa Dua Tour | Pandawa Beach | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Pandawa Beach is a natural beach tourist destination, where we can see the natural beauty of the beach which is still beauty and natural, with clear water and white sand stretching along the beach, making this Pandawa beach tourist destination very famous among tourists. Located in Nusa Dua village and is one of the tourist destinations in Nusa Dua, this beach was previously named Secret Beach, because previously there was no good access to this beach, since it became known to tourists, the government moved quickly to build access by dredging the coral cliffs in this area and make road to beach, so now this beach is busy with tourists. Apart from the beach, there is also a Pandawa statue taken from the Mahabharata story, carved on the edge of the coral cliff, making this beach more interesting to visit.
description.html: Pandawa Beach is a natural beach tourist destination, where we can see the natural beauty of the beach which is still beauty and natural, with clear water and white sand stretching along the beach, making this Pandawa beach tourist destination very famous among tourists. Apart from the beach, there is also a Pandawa statue taken from the Mahabharata story, carved on the edge of the coral cliff, making this beach more interesting to visit.

title.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour | Garuda Wisnu Kencana

image.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour | Garuda Wisnu Kencana | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Garuda Wisnu Kencana is a tourist destination in the village of Nusa Dua with a Garuda Wisnu Kencana statue whose height is estimated to be higher than the Statue of Liberty, statue is made of a mixture of copper and steel. Built as an icon of the island of Bali and a cultural park, where you can see various arts from the island of Bali and there is also a large yard as a place for picnics and recreation for family and friends. In this place there are many entertainment venues, and this place is also often used as a venue for concerts and performances by foreign artists, due to the large area of around 240 hectares. Garuda Wisnu Kencana is the window of island arts and culture against the backdrop of nature and an amazing panorama, making one of the main objectives for a variety of performing arts, exhibitions, conferences or religious visits.

price.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Denpasar City Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 375,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,150,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Lunch + Entrance Fee + Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Half Day Nusa Dua Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Visit Water Blow Nusa Dua
Visit Garuda Wisnu Kencana
Lunch Finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
